question: The theme of 2018 National Science Day is _____________.
option3: Clean Energy Options and Nuclear Safety
option4: Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future
answer: Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future
explanation: National Science Day (NSD) is celebrated every year on 28 February. The theme of NSD-2018 is "Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future". NSD is celebrated to commemorate the discovery of the 'Raman Effect', which led to Sir C.V. Raman winning the Noble Prize. The theme has been chosen for the purpose of raising public appreciation of the scientific issues involved.
